entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor - Wasm pre-rendering (without server interactivity) - MSAL Auth on client side only not working #58833
  • Type disciminator is missing with OkResult #58832
  • Embed a Blazor component inside an Angular App needs very long to be rendered #58831
  • Loading an mp4 video static asset in Blazor returns http 416 error #58829
    9.0.x
  • The SignalR server is suspended and can no longer send messages to the client. #58828
  • BlazorWebAppOidc AddOpenIdConnect with GetClaimsFromUserInfoEndpoint = true doesn't propogate role claims to client #58826
  • Unhandled error when using Blazor .NET 8 template in Global page mode with FireFox #58824

Closed

  • Pvvx existing to other #58825

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add examples to AddOpenApi extension method/overloads #58808
    feature-openapi, area-minimal, 10.0-preview1
  • Set up Windows installer build for the VMR #58820
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview1
  • Fix local failure in GET_GracefulServerShutdown_AbortRequestsAfterHostTimeout #58747
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Convert ref and runtime packs to use the SharedFramework SDK and Arcade's installer tooling #58612
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Add package for consuming Blazor framework assets #58721
    area-blazor
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-alpha.1.24553.6 #58776
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • don't throw a misleading exception upon a BadHttpRequestException #58688
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • use GeneratedRegex property #58710
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
